msbt.message: The Bug-Off starts at nine, right? Why isn't it nine yet?!

You ready for the Bug-Off today?! Because I sure am, !Y'know how they sell bug repellent? Well, I got the opposite! I'm gonna spend my day COVERED in bugs!That actually sounds super gross. Maybe I oughta duck home and wash it off before I get started.
Yo! You ready for the Bug-Off at nine? I'm so revved up I could scream!
It's Bug-Off time! Air out those nets and get ready to catch some bugs!
Perfect weather for some bug- catchin'. Ready or not, bugs, here I come!
You're in this too, huh? Nice! Gonna be a good day for us both. I can feel it, !
Did you have a blast? 'Cause I did! I already got the next one marked on my calendar, !Yes, I keep a calendar.
I did OK todaybut next time, I'm gonna rock it!
I caught so many bugs today that they oughta call me "Flypaper" from now on, !But I mighta gotten carried away, 'cause I have no idea what to do with all these bugs now that I have 'em.
You thinkin' about doin' the Bug-Off? Then go see Flick in the plaza!
The Bug-Off doesn't end till six tonight. We gotta get the lead out!
If I'm gonna be in the Bug-Off, I wanna win! I'm gonna tear it up out there, !
Just when you think you can't catch another bugyou gotta dig deep and will yourself to keep going! YEAH!
